org.coniks.coniks_server

Class KeyOps

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.coniks.coniks_server.KeyOps

  • public class KeyOps
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements all operations involving encryption keys that a CONIKS server must perform. Current encryption/signing algorithm used: RSA with SHA-256.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyOps() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.security.interfaces.RSAPublicKey loadPublicKey(ServerConfig config, java.lang.String keyOwner)
      Load the given server keyOwner's public key from the truststore indicated in this server's configuration config.
      static java.security.interfaces.RSAPrivateKey loadSigningKey(ServerConfig config)
      Load this CONIKS server's private key from the keystore indicated in the server's configuration config.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • loadSigningKey

        public static java.security.interfaces.RSAPrivateKey loadSigningKey(ServerConfig config)
        Load this CONIKS server's private key from the keystore indicated in the server's configuration config.
        Returns:
        The server's private RSA key, or null in the case of an Exception.

      • loadPublicKey

        public static java.security.interfaces.RSAPublicKey loadPublicKey(ServerConfig config,
                                                  java.lang.String keyOwner)
        Load the given server keyOwner's public key from the truststore indicated in this server's configuration config.
        Returns:
        The keyOwner's public RSA key, or null in the case of an Exception.
